archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Microsoft Power Apps
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Power Apps is a suite of services, applications, connectors, and data platforms that allow users to create custom business applications without writing code. It is a low-code platform that enables users to build apps quickly and easily using a drag-and-drop interface. Power Apps can be used to create web and mobile applications that can be integrated with other Microsoft services such as SharePoint, Dynamics 365, and Power BI.
